message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you our top-of-the-line product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within a certain budget. Can you consider my offer?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that budget constraints can be a challenge. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $10500. What do you think?
Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $9800?
I understand that you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer the product to you for $10200. What do you think?
Thank you for the new offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $9500?
I understand that you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer the product to you for $10000. This is as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $9500 and $10000. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $9750?

I understand that you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer the product to you for $9900. This is as close to your offer as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9800, but no more. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $9800?
